org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.utils

Class JsonUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.openr66.protocol.http.restv2.utils.JsonUtils

  • public final class JsonUtils
extends Object
    A series of utility methods for serializing and deserializing JSON.

      • deserializeRequest

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode deserializeRequest(io.netty.handler.codec.http.HttpRequest request)
        Deserializes a request's content as an ObjectNode
        Parameters:
        request - the request to deserialize
        Returns:
        the deserialized JSON object
        Throws:
        RestErrorException - If the content is not a valid JSON object.
        javax.ws.rs.NotSupportedException - If the content type is not JSON.
        javax.ws.rs.InternalServerErrorException - if an unexpected error occurred
